text:
Good Morning! :smile: I asked because in the last period I felt really stressed between school projects and work. I work only 3 days a week (in the past has been worse), but I feel that in those days I'm wasting a lot of time I could spend on learning and practising much more animation. I think is probably normal to feel like that and I'm trying to get things too fast.

Is this your YouTube channel (<https://www.youtube.com/user/DANjustYEAHvisuals/videos>)? Are those Minecraft Animations! :smile: It's funny because I started animation because of that game! :slightly_smiling_face: (<https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLrukei5Vlre6xbI1fIPFWcVbZ1i7qoYQp>)

attachments.title: DANjustYEAHvisuals
attachments.text: Hey there! I'm DANjustYEAH, also known as Dan Radford. I have a 3D animation and visual effects background. Currently focusing on audiovisual works in the fo...

text: It can be very tricky to work on things in your own time, it seems that's a common problem for people on here. Probably not the best advice but I tend to work late into the night and lose a bit of sleep here and there, luckily we get slower days at work so can just about get away with it
Aha yes that is! I'll send you the latest showreel though to have a click through

attachments.title: Showreel 2019 v1
attachments.video_html: <iframe width="400" height="225" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/KnHDcjiv2UA?feature=oembed&autoplay=1&iv_load_policy=3" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

text: Minecraft was great to learn with initially and the community was amazing. It really kick started my adventure into the world of 3D animation
Do you have a portfolio I can take a look at?

Yes. This is my showreel at the moment (<https://vimeo.com/301972243|https://vimeo.com/301972243>). At the moment I'm working on a body mechanics shot and if you want I can send to you a syncsketch link where if you have any critique to give me through drawings and comments would be much appreciated. Thank you!
